text: 21:24 Esra 9:7; Onger Akaba 79:1; Aisaia 63:18; Akar Mogomem 11:2Eghtɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba mɨsozir sababar tarazigh inivtɨ me arɨghirɨtɨ, me tarazi suighɨva, me amangɨtɨma me nguibar Israelɨn azenan itibar mangam. Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bar pazɨva Jerusalem damu mangɨ dughiar me Jerusalemɨn ganamin dughiam gɨvagham.”
